snippet: A report by the Massachusetts inspector general found that a chemist who may have compromised tens of thousands of criminal cases was the “sole bad actor” at the drug lab where she worked.
abstract: Report conducted by Massachusetts inspector general Glenn A Cunha finds that chemist Annie Dookhan, who may have compromised tens of thousands of criminal cases, was the 'sole bad actor' at drug lab where she worked; takes lab's management to task for lapses that created atmosphere enabling her actions.
lead_paragraph: A report by the Massachusetts inspector general found that a chemist who may have compromised tens of thousands of criminal cases was the “sole bad actor” at the drug lab where she worked.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Report Chides Drug Laboratory for Lapses
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Report Chides Drug Laboratory for Lapses
